Introduction
This topic contains information on processing MOD payments along with other death benefits, including
spouse receiving an apportionment at the time the FNOD command is performed
entitlement to Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) and MOD with no running award
entitlement to MOD with DIC or Survivors Pension already running,
and
amending a running spouse award after MOD has been paid by finance action, interim MOD process, or retro batch MOD
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B  - System Information for Veteran Notice of Death (NOD) and Month of Death (MOD) Processing
citation: Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
